title: sotelorene
author: sotelorene
content: Well I think at this point in time we go dey very careful with the people wey we dey call our friend or bestie because this particular set of people go fit do you waiting no good. Things they happen well well for this world,  some go dey behave like say them care but deep down dey wan cripple you. Pesin wey you dey eat with for the same plate fit deny you tomorrow  say him/her no sabi or never see you before. Pesin wey you dey show your account balance fit arrange assassin for you and again pesin wey you call bestie or friend fit see something wey dey come your way him block am so make ona dey very careful even with things wey you dey share with them.

comments.body: This one no be small matter oo, but some person dey look am common, the people wey we dey tell some certain things matters a lot, some times we dey tell the wrong persons very useful information wey no suppose be so, some times I fit say na because of happiness naim make us dey over share some kind things, but if at all make we dey very careful. Sometimes the people wey we think say na our friend na just Hippocrates, na only when dem dey around us naim dem dey talk good about us, or that time naim dem dey act friendly, but for our back, dem be like enemy of progress.Na why even the bitcoin wey we dey hold e no good make we even tell some family members, not to come talk of friends. I for my self, like make my bitcoin holding dey as anonymous as my seed phrase, make e be say na only me know where I keep am.

comments.author: Youngkhngdiddy
comments.body: Quote from: Y3shot on November 28, 2023, 02:59:55 PMPeople just need to understand that human can change, this should be the reason why people needs to be reserved and not to be too open to everybody they meet. Their are some things that needs to be personal and their somethings that are meant for people to know,  it is not every thing people needs to disclose to friends and family members.  Privacy matters alot and it is good to keep somethings to yourself if not letting other people to know about it can be use as a tool for destruction.    Well, being open comes with some consequences, both good and bad. First the good consequence of being unreserved or open aids ones ability to socialize, foster good relationships with people and even grow a community of like minds. For the bad consequence of being unreserved, there may be people that have unhealthy intentions towards you and then would want to take advantage of your friendliness and interactive nature to put you in a state of worst regrets per say. At the same time, you may tend to say a whole lot of things that'll render you vulnerable to backstabbers and evil hearted people that disguise as good to you.    There's no compulsion to staying reserved, interact, be jovial but be mindful of speech, do not let out things and don't loose guard in communication. Talking excessively can be avoided. Sometimes it's very much good to listen than to speak. To much of details about you should be avoided unless you will be prune to attacks. Know the kind of people you share your personal life with, the world is a cold world. And everyone is only out for themselves.
